title: Heartbeat
creator_credit: Artransa Films, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian Road Safety Council
brief_description: The heartbeat under normal conditions is shown. A young couple go to an entertainment where there is exciting music and alcohol. Driving away they suffer a fatal accident. The gentleman’s heartbeat is reflected in the tempo of a jazz quartet.
creator_credit_for_label: Artransa Films, Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Australian Road Safety Council
